game.name: Sara’s Key Lime Pie
game.description:
Sara is a cool teacher who always enjoys the cooking and helping people to make them feel happy. This time she has spotted a wonderful way to spread happiness. She has a plan to make delicious desserts and share it with everyone. Once you are done with helping Sara to cook it here, you would surely try to make it at your home to surprise your family members and friends. In this cool cooking game for girls, all you need to follow Sara instructions to get your job done in the optimum possible way.Â 

Your task is to focus on the instructions for the recipe and very soon you would get the tasty outcomes. Open your mind while following the instructions given on the screen, so that your lime pie accepts the shape that could make them look tastier and healthier. This mouthwatering dessert will be perfect for any occasion and can be prepared shortly in this cool flash game for girls. Do not forget to serve them with lime for extra zest. It is your responsibility to check if everyone gets a slice of it.

In this latest Sara Key Lime Pie game, Sara will teach you how to cook highly scrumptious graham cracker crumble pie crust with lime. You would not restrict yourself from trying them again and again to satisfy your taste buds. Bake a mouthwatering key lime pie with Sara. In this kitchen game, you can use eggs, milk, lime zest and lime juice for filling a purpose. You can also use the whipped cream to top off your pie.
